dataList.name: Curio
dataList.desc: When certain conditions are fulfilled, replace this effect with 'Art Medium'

dataList.name: Spark of Inspiration
dataList.desc: Deal +10% damage against targets with Art Medium

dataList.name: Art Medium
dataList.desc: Take +10% damage from Lust Skills if this unit has Bleed

dataList.name: Exquisite Aesthetics
dataList.desc:
- Plus Coin Skills gain Coin Power +1
- Minus Coin Skills gain Base Power +(4 / # of Coins)
- Deal +30% damage with Skills

dataList.name: Firepower
dataList.desc:
- Max Stack: 10
- Deal +10% damage for every Stack

dataList.name: Delicateness
dataList.desc:
- Max Stack: 10
- Take +10% damage for every Stack

dataList.name: Shin (å¿ƒ) - ???
dataList.desc:
- Min & Max Speed +1
- Offense Level +2, Defense Level +2
- Gain +1 more Poise Potency and Poise Count from Skills
- Deal +(missing HP percentage + 25)% damage (max 100%)

dataList.name: Bridle
dataList.desc:
- All allies gain ((current Floor - 4) x 10)% max HP (max 60%)
- All allies gain Offense Level +(current Floor - 4) (max 5)
